name: Snack-A-Pillar
description:
Welcome to "Snack-A-Pillar". In this game, you will help a hungry caterpillar traverse through tricky underground mazes, so that it can get the nutrients it needs to grow.

This game was built by the College of Dupage Game Development Club over the spring and summer of 2020.

Objective:

Collect as many food items as you can without letting the caterpillar hit any walls or itself.

Controls:

Use the arrow keys to move the caterpillar.

Credits:

Technical Support: Phillip Kobylinski
Lead Design and Programming: Carson Christ
Programming: James Pytel
Lead Audio and Music Composition: Angela Geiss
Music Composition: Aurora Troncoso
Lead Artist: McKenna Fisher
Artist: Nemo "Glareyo"
developers: College of Dupage Game Development Club
